ygData.subject: Laughing at Striker

(Thanks Allloran for allowing me to control Eagle Eye and for making 
the char.)

Trainers

Prebon guided Spears to the brig section as they found Striker's 
cell. Prebon relieved Bullet.

"Go now. We have this under control. Hammer said he might have 
something you should look at. Wait infront of the base for him."

"Yes sir." Bullet left. Prebon gazed intot the cell and saw Striker.

"Look at him. Good news! You are going to go home soon. Just a quick 
little surgery and you'll be set to return. I'm not going to put you 
offline for this operation. More fun watching you scream. But Spears 
wants to say something to you."

Meanwhile, Hammer arrived to meet Bullet.

"Look at the scrap I found from a bot I killed! It's mostly intact, 
with some good weapons!"

"That means...."

"Right! You can probably make the HB1 again!"

"Yeah, but it will still be different. We'll call it the HB2. The 
Hammer Bullet 2. It'll be the greatest war suit anyone has ever worn."

"Come on, let's get started!"
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream tried to contacr Zardus again.

"Zardus! I've got an emergency. I just need to ask you a quick 
question: How many of your soldiers would you be willing to spare to 
join our army to fight Megatron? Bloodystrike is already there, and 
Gotron said he would join, but is their anyone else I can take back 
with me?"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix yelled to the rest of the group.

"Snowcat, Ratchet, Andromena, come on! Help us install these computer 
boards until Ramulus gets back!"

Brix adn Fliq re-enetered the Ark and went back to work.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois/Eagle Eye

Vulois had to think of a strategy. He saw Eagle Eye try to attack, 
and made it look like he almost wanted to die, so he had a plan. He 
called Eagle Eye over.

"Eagle Eye, would you anything to keep the mission alive? Even at the 
point of your own death?"

"Yes I would Vulois."

"Than so be it. Good-bye Eagle Eye. You have surved with true loyalty 
to the mission."

Vulois de-activated Eagle Eye and opened up his chest plate. He 
crefully removed the Spark and dropped Eagle Eye's lifeles body to 
the ground. He raised the spark above his head.

"Now Nemesis, meet your greatest threat! I have the power of myself 
and Child with me, and the Sprak of an honest and true bot. You can 
never win now." Vulois began to channel energy, almost all he had, 
into Eagle Eye's spark, "NOW MEET YOUR DOOM!!!" Vulois through the 
spark with huge force right at Nemesis, hoping to make contact.

(This will probably kill Eagle Eye when it touches Nemesis. You can 
either say killed by Vulois or Nemesis. It doesn't really matter.)
